thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 16 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Yes Bank Says Co Has Nil Exposure To Entities Mentioned In Reports Of Fraud In Gems And Jewellery Sector

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yes Bank Says Co Has Nil Exposure To Entities Mentioned In Reports Of Fraud In Gems And Jewellery Sector
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - Yes Bank Ltd:
* SAYS CO HAS NIL EXPOSURE TO ENTITIES OR AFFILIATES MENTIONED REPORTS OF FRAUD IN GEMS AND JEWELLERY SECTOR
* YES BANK - PROACTIVELY DE-RISKING PORTFOLIO FOR BORROWERS WITH AGGREGATE EXPOSURES IN RANGES 1 BILLION RUPEES-10 BILLION RUPEES & 10 BILLION RUPEES-50 BILLION RUPEES
* SAYS RBI'S REVISED FRAMEWORK FOR RESOLUTION OF STRESSED ASSETS MAY HAVE ONLY MINIMAL IMPACT ON BANK'S PORTFOLIO‍​ Source text - bit.ly/2sCVuiE Further company coverage:
